name: Turrisclock
tagline: Driving clock movement from Turris Router
body:
This is a hardware and software design allowing you to connect common quartz analog clock movement to Turris router and let it controlled by [Turris router](https://www.turris.cz). Such clock features some ultimate features:

* precise atomic time thanks to NTP
* ability to pause and resume movement at any moment (no more ticking disturbing your sleep)
* battery-free operation
* special effect like stepping 5 seconds at time
